alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 2:52PM CDT until June 08 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Harrison County in southern Mississippi... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gulfport, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Lyman and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 28 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
